ygData.subject: Priest of ORDER Schedule
ygData.msgSnippet: It s tough being RED on Blue servers. It appears that a new GM/Char has been making rounds to convert the fallen back to Protected status.  For some reason, I
ygData.messageBody:
It's tough being RED on Blue servers.

It appears that a new GM/Char has been making
rounds to convert the fallen back to Protected
status. For some reason, I keep missing him.

I asked a guide, er /Petitioned, and was told
that a Schedule was posted on the Everquest site.
I clicked about, but didn't see one.
I was told to ALSO check the EQVault for postings. None easily visible there.

So.. Those of you here in the "know", any guesses?

Cleric Taven
[Veeshan]
